Question
========

In a sample of 15 high school students, the correlation coefficient between the final grade for physics and biology was was calculated, with the result r~S~ = 0.49. For the *two*sided exceeding probability, when testing whether there is actual correlation, holds:

Answerlist
----------

* P < 0.01
* 0.01 < P < 0.05
* 0.05 < P < 0.10
* P > 0.10

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* P < 0.01: Incorrect
* 0.01 < P < 0.05: Incorrect
* 0.05 < P < 0.10: Correct
* P > 0.10: Incorrect
